21struct ManualCommand {
22 uint32_t timestamp_ms;
23 uint8_t modo;
24 uint16_t ax_raw;
25 uint16_t ay_raw;
26 uint16_t battery_mV;
27};
28
29using ManualCallback = std::function<void(const ManualCommand&)>;
30
31class EspNowReceiver : public core::Modulo {
32public:
33 explicit EspNowReceiver(uint8_t canal_wifi = 1) : canal_(canal_wifi) {}
34
35 bool iniciar() override;
36 void actualizar() override;
37 void detener() override {}
38
40 void setCallback(ManualCallback cb) { callback_ = cb; }
41
42private:
43 static void onDataRecv(const uint8_t* mac, const uint8_t* incomingData, int len);
44 void handlePacket(const uint8_t* data, int len);
45
46 uint8_t canal_;

48 static EspNowReceiver* instancia_activa_;

51};

53} // namespace comms
